text: Hello, I have trouble starting up a Julia notebook with Jupyter extension in vs Code. When using the 1.0.10 language server the language server is stuck on starting. When I go back to version 1.0.8 as it's suggested in some GitHub issues of the vscode julia extension, I still cannot connect to a kernel.
